name: station-cli
description: CLI tool to control station board and powerbanks

scripts.build:executable:macos: npm run clean && npm run build && npx pkg . --targets node18-macos-x64 --output executables/station-cli-macos-x64
scripts.build:executable:linux: npm run clean && docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/app -w /app --platform linux/arm/v7 node:18.17.0-bullseye-slim bash -c 'apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 make g++ git && npm install --no-optional && npm run build && NODE_OPTIONS=--no-warnings npx pkg . --targets node18-linux-arm --output executables/station-cli-linux-arm --no-bytecode --no-native-modules --public'
